npcs.name: Brother Bolerg
utterances: By Brell's hammer! Are you trying to get us all killed!?

npcs.name: Brother Gimeft
utterances: Ahhh... Quit with your incessant poking!

npcs.name: a charred acolyte
utterances: To the grave with you!
I'm shattered and broken.
I didn't need those bones anyway.
Brains! It's what's for dinner.
Dying didn't feel good the first time.
You cannot eliminate us!
Your eyes are so pretty.
Final death comes at last.
Rest in peace.
Your blood calls to me.
You've shaken the dust from my bones.

npcs.name: a charred diviner
utterances: As I rise from the grave,  you will now take my place!
You cannot eliminate us!
Your blood calls to me.
The chill of undeath calls for you.
I'm shattered and broken.

npcs.name: a charred herald
utterances: Seek death and it finds you.
As I rise from the grave,  you will now take my place!
That pile of bones was my friend!
Your eyes are so pretty.
I'm shattered and broken.
You've shaken the dust from my bones.
To the grave with you!
Dying didn't feel good the first time.
Final death comes at last.
Brains! It's what's for dinner.
Your blood calls to me.
Rest in peace.

npcs.name: Galintari the Apocryphal
utterances: What do we have here? Intruders, hrmmm...? Well... I guess it is dinner time... RISE MY CHILDREN! RISE and feast upon the flesh of these insolent fools!

npcs.name: Sir Thothur Dorarr
utterances: Hrmm... The unholy power seems to emanate from over there... that's where our brothers were lost... but what are... Oh, what is it?
Well, nice to meet yah! We could really use your help.

We're in over our heads. Last week we lost several of our brothers to the undead, and now we struggle to hold down this small fort. It's difficult keeping the undead wards working while hordes of undead minions attack us. Can you fight them off for us?
Why are you back already? I can still see the undead roaming around out there!
Hrmm ... something's allowing them to return from their graves.
Perhaps a sigil of undeath ... Here, take this ward of undeath. You can destroy any sigils of undeath you come across with this. Simply touch the ward against the sigil.
Good! I appreciate your help!
Did you destroy all of the sigils?
Good job! I think we can take it from here. Soon we will rebuild this Gully. Thanks again for the help. Please take this.
